about_the_game:
Don't forget to follow us and join the wishlist!

■ Plot Summary

A legendary hacker, Shadow Code, renowned across the Internet, lurks in this ordinary town.

Shadow Code is an elusive hacker who only follows his own rules and takes on cases based on his own aesthetics and preferences. Once he accepts a case, he will always be able to fulfill the commission perfectly with his profound technical knowledge and his superbly resourceful reactions, and of course, the reward he receives is not low at all.

One night, Shadow Code receives an anonymous letter containing a puzzle test. Solving the puzzle is not difficult, but what Shadow Code doesn't expect is that the events that follow this letter will lead him to the greatest challenge of his hacker career.

■ Game Description

You will play as Shadow Code, the legendary hacker, using professional technology and self-built auxiliary system to traverse the Internet and solve all kinds of complicated problems:

  • Intelligence Deciphering:

A technique to decipher hidden messages and case clues.

  • Websites Hacking:

A technique to break into websites through backdoors to obtain classified information.

  • Digital Data Reconstruction:

A technique to restore broken digital data to its original state.

  • Electrical Circuit Reconstruction:

A technique to destroy, reorganize and connect electronic devices.

  • Unidirectional Frequency Synchronization:

A technique to forcibly synchronize with the target's electronic system to enable manipulation.

  • Trojan Implantation:

A technique to implant a computer virus into a target system for various purposes.

  • Encrypted Media Decryption:

A technique to decrypt encrypted media files.

■ Hacker's Daily Life

Armed with these hacking skills, Shadow Code is going to experience a thrilling adventure with the mysterious client—Agent “Saku”, helping her get rid of a mysterious organization and ultimately complete an impossible rescue mission.


Except for the main mission, there are also various events that may happen in the town. You are free to act according to your willingness and solve the multiple problems that occur in the town.

  • Exposing the evils of a unscrupulous councilor

  • Searching for the missing street artist

  • Discovering the reality of a “haunted house”

  • Remotely protect children in a fire

Solving events not only enhances Shadow Code's reputation but may also gain special "rewards", or may even meet new friends, which unlocks entirely new story arcs.

■ Character Introduction

  • Agent “Saku”

who belongs to the mysterious organization LUNA.

Once an abandoned orphan, she was then adopted and raised by the organization. Having mastered a wide range of skills taught within LUNA, she earned her title and became one of the most elite agents in the organization.

Despite being good at various kinds of weapons and martial arts, beneath the cold-blooded agent identity lies a gentle, kind and compassionate soul.

■ Game Features

  • Exquisite hand-drawn and animated CG scenes

  • Experience the secret operations of agents, including intelligence gathering, pursuit, assassination, sabotage, espionage, etc.

  • Solve various puzzles and step by step assist Shuo in completing missions

  • Break through her defenses and take your relationship to the next level...

content_descriptors.notes:
Character is over the age of 20.
Content Warning: "Saku the Covert Agent" content includes images and descriptions of sexual organs, sexual intercourse, etc.

name: Saku the Covert Agent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10/11 x64
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: As an elite hacker, you have received an anonymous commission. You will collaborate with the special agent "Saku" from an unknown organization to complete a thrilling mission.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
